meanings.definition: A benzodiazepine drug used to treat anxiety and alcohol withdrawal symptoms.
meanings.sent1: The doctor prescribed oxazepam to help with my anxiety.
meanings.sent2: She took oxazepam to ease her alcohol withdrawal symptoms.
meanings.sent3: After taking oxazepam, I felt like a weight had been lifted off my shoulders.
meanings.sent4: The calming effect of oxazepam was like a gentle breeze on a hot day.
meanings.sent5: The image of oxazepam pills reminded me to stay calm during stressful times.
